00005 #include "VParameterNode.hh"
00006 #include "Message.hh"
00007 #include <fstream>
00008 #include <typeinfo>
00009 bool VParameterNode::SaveToFile(const char *fname)
00010 {
00011   std::ofstream fout(fname);
00012   if(fout.fail()){
00013     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open file "<<fname<<" for writing."<<std::endl;
00014     return false;
00015   }
00016   return WriteTo(fout);
00017 }
00018 
00019 bool VParameterNode::ReadFromFile(const char *fname, const std::string& key,
00020                                   bool suppress_errs)
00021 {
00022   if(key != "")
00023     Message(DEBUG)<<"Searching for '"<<key<<"' in file "<<fname<<std::endl;
00024   std::ifstream fin(fname);
00025   if(fin.fail()){
00026     if(!suppress_errs)
00027       Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open file "<<fname<<" for reading."<<std::endl;
00028     return false;
00029   }
00030   bool fail = ReadFromByKey(fin, key,suppress_errs);
00031   fin.close();
00032   return fail;
00033 }
00034 
00035 std::istream& VParameterNode::ReadFromByKey(std::istream& in, 
00036                                             const std::string& key,
00037                                             bool suppress_errs)
00038 {
00039   if(key == "")
00040     return ReadFrom(in);
00041   std::string next("empty");
00042   while( in >> next && next != key ) {}
00043   if (in.eof() && !suppress_errs){
00044     Message(ERROR)<<"Key "<<key<<" was not found.\n";
00045     return in;
00046   }
00047   else if(in.fail() && !suppress_errs){
00048     Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading '"<<key<<"' from stream.\n";
00049     return in;
00050   }
00051   
00052   return ReadFrom(in);
00053 }
00054 
00055 int VParameterNode::PrintHelp(const std::string& myname) const
00056 {
00057   std::cout<<"--------------------------------------------------------\n";
00058   std::cout<<"Parameter name: "<<myname<<"\n"
00059            <<"Default name:   "<<_default_key<<"\n";
00060   if(_helptext == "")
00061     std::cout<<"No description available for this parameter.\n";
00062   else
00063     std::cout<<"Description:    "<<_helptext<<std::endl;
00064 
00065   return 0;
00066 }
